resources.string:
DroidSniff comes with absolutely no warranty.

You use this software on your own risk.
The developer is not responsible for any damages caused by DroidSniff or it´s usage.
It´s only the users responsibility to check his countrys laws in order to make sure that the usage of DroidSniff is permitted by law in his country. In some countries stealing someones identity might be prohibited by law.

Always think about what you´re doing! Stealing someons identity can cause real trouble for him and maybe for you

YOUR PHONE SEEMS NOT TO BE ROOTED\n\nDroidSniff can only run on phones having superuser access enabled. So if the phone is not rooted and DroidSniff does not work properly, please do not ask for support! Nevertheless, DroidSniff will start for compatibility reasons
Wifi connection lost or changed. Stopped Listening!
Busybox should be installed in order to run DroidSniff properly. Do you want to install BusyBox from market?
Do you really want to delete all hosts from blacklist?
You must accept this disclaimer in order to use DroidSniff!
If you want to keep it running in background press HOME button!

This will start a debug session. It will start Listening and collect debug information. Let DroidSniff keep listening for some seconds (at least 30) and press "stop". An email will open which contains all debug information. No data will be sent silently!

I hope you like DroidSniff!

DroidSniff is free and open source. Nevertheless, it takes a lot of time to support DroidSniff and also some money for running www.DroidSniff.de

So if you would like to appreciate this work, you are very welcome to donate some money to make this happen. 

Thanks!
Yes, your work is worth it!
There is an update available!\nPress \'OK\' to start download the latest update now
Enter custom URL to load with hijacked cookies
